title: Area/Volume: Region with 2 integrals part - c

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the x-axis and the graphs of yÂ = ln x and y = 5 - x, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: The horizontal line y = k divides R into two regions of equal area. Write, but do not solve, an equation involving one or more integrals whose solution gives the value of k.

frqParts.text: The horizontal line y = k divides R into two regions of equal area. Write, but do not solve, an equation involving one or more integrals whose solution gives the value of k.

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
